description:
Get your peat pots at my affiliated link: http://amzn.to/2DjFkvs

I crafted for this adventure (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2FQWamS

Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

Elmer's Glue-All Multi-Purpose Liquid Glue (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gAQi9P

Cutting Mat (affiliated link):
http://amzn.to/2knK8Ye

Chip brushes (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2DO7YWA

Craft scissors 3 pack (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2DOymQd

Learn to ice hunter hut models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the huts are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Ice Hunter Hide and Bone Huts Terrain (DM's Craft #186)
